mapper.insert: insert into permission (permission_id, permission_remark, permission_name, permission_prefix, permission_code) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select permission_id, permission_remark, permission_name, permission_prefix, permission_code from permission
